meanings.sent1: The aching tooth kept him up all night.
meanings.sent2: She rubbed her aching muscles after a long workout.
meanings.sent3: The aching chair complained loudly whenever someone sat on it.
meanings.sent4: The aching engine of the old car sputtered and groaned.
meanings.sent5: The aching sensation in his chest felt like a heavy weight pressing down on him.

meanings.sent1: Her aching back made it hard to bend over.
meanings.sent2: He winced in pain as his aching knee gave out.
meanings.sent3: The aching puppy whined pitifully until it was given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The aching heart longed for the comfort of a familiar embrace.
meanings.sent5: The aching sensation in her head pulsed with each heartbeat.
